hanzi-su-wiki:
亜

Значения

Следовать чему-либо, походить на что-либо; Азия, азиатский

Мнемоника

Брак в работе, полученный из-за смещения рейсмуса 工 при разметке. Второсортный, некачественный, а также Азия как часть света худшего качества.

Варианты

亞, 亚

Японский вариант Азии

亚亚		亜Asia, second
  • looks vaguely like the capital A

X		sub-, rank next, Asia
  • bulging sides of huge 巨 trees are cut off to make beams and planks, that's the job of "subordinate" apprentices
副; 次; 悪
heisig_story: In this kanji, the abbreviation for Asia, you should be able to see the character for mouth behind the Roman numeral II.
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Азия, ранг дальше, после того, как пришел, -ous
koohiiStory1: In Asian countries, people use II chopsticks to get things into their mouths. Just imagine someone shoving a piece of sushi into their mouths with chopsticks.
koohiiStory2: A mouth barred up and not aloud to speak freely is the sign of asia (korea, China, pakistan etc).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both Asia.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: As long as you know the radical Asia, you know the kanji Asia.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: What's the first sound in Asia? It's A (あ). Nice and easy!
Ru_Russian: буква "А", Азия, под- (подвид, подгруппа и т.п.)
Ru_Notes:
Используется как фонетическая буква А, в большом количестве названий (особенно — Азия, цинк, лён), а также как приставка под- (подвид, подгруппа, субтропики).
Сравни: 唖 (おし、ア、アク немой)
Ru_Words:

  • цинк
    • 亜麻あま
  • лён

  • подвид; подгруппа
    • 亜流ありゅう
  • последователь; подражатель
    • 亜熱帯あねったい
  • субтропики
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a reflection of the west (覀) = Asia

Heisig constituents: Asia, roman two, mouth
Heisig: In this kanji, the abbreviation for Asia, you should be able to see the character for mouth behind the Roman numeral II.
koohii1: In Asian countries, people use II chopsticks to get things into their mouths. Just imagine someone shoving a piece of sushi into their mouths with chopsticks.
koohii2: A mouth barred up and not aloud to speak freely is the sign of asia (korea, China, pakistan etc).

亜科(あか): suborder, subfamily

亜字的基本解释

亜
yà
古同“亚”。

亜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yà］
同“亞1”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“亞”，《古今杂剧》、《太平乐府》、《目连记》作“亜”。按，亦为日本用汉字。
[②]［wù］
同“亞2”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“亞”，《古今杂剧》、《太平乐府》、《目连记》作“亜”。按，亦为日本用汉字。
[③]［yā］
同“亞3”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“亞”，《古今杂剧》、《太平乐府》、《目连记》作“亜”。按，亦为“亞”的日本用汉字。

亜字的康熙字典解释
亜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
亜字的起名意思

暂无。

Sub
yà
Gu Tong "Asia".
Sub
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yà］
Same as "Asia 1".
"Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Asia", "Ancient and Modern Zaju", "Taiping Yuefu", "Mu Lianji" as "亜". Press, it is also a Chinese character used in Japan.
[②]［wù］
Same as "Asia 2".
"Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Asia", "Ancient and Modern Zaju", "Taiping Yuefu", "Mu Lianji" as "亜". Press, it is also a Chinese character used in Japan.
[③] [yā]
Same as "Asia 3".
"Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Asia", "Ancient and Modern Zaju", "Taiping Yuefu", "Mu Lianji" as "亜". Press, Japanese kanji which is also "亚".

yà
яп. вм. 亚
Radicals: 亜  (asia)
Meaning Mnemonic
The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both Asia.
As long as you know the radical Asia, you know the kanji Asia.
Reading Mnemonic
What's the first sound in Asia? It's A (あ). Nice and easy!
A is for Asia!
